item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:-12 Chances: CNH Industrial NV has been recognized for its innovative and customer-inspired products, winning multiple awards in the agricultural industry.The company is making efforts to educate and support the next generation of farmers through partnerships with educational institutions. Risks: The delisting of the companyâ€™s common shares from Euronext Milan may result in decreased trading activity and potential loss of investor confidence.
